text: She's looking forward to the birth of her first child with boyfriend Robin Thicke. And 22 - year - old April Love Geary is obviously loving being pregnant - posing in her underwear to highlight her growing bump on social media. Taking a mirror selfie, the pretty brunette kept a hand on her stomach as she posed. Scroll down for video Oh baby! Robin Thicke's pregnant girlfriend April Love Geary shows off her growing bump in her underwear, writing on Instagram'Already so in love with you'' Already so in love with you,'she wrote, adding a heart emoticon. A second picture showed her posing in her bra top, hearts around her head.'Only got eyes for you,'she wrote. April announced her pregnancy August 17, posting an ultrasound
